hints.content: The $\goldD{A}$ is at $\redD9{:}{\blueE{10}}$ because it is located $\blueE{10}$ ticks after $\redD9{:}{00}$.

On a clock, $\redD9{:}{00} $ looks like this:

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 9. The long minute hand points to 12. Labels outside the edge of the clock are number 1 through 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/11e0e1df541c4ade45e72d680dbf85ec58bc724a)

And just like on the number line, $9{:}{\blueE{10}}$ is $\blueE{10}$ ticks after $9{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 9. The long minute hand points to 2. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4cb87c54c0d1b52986c59584aa519614984298b2)

This clock shows $9{:}{10}$.

![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 9. The long minute hand points to 2.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ee9a259c88ca4263ba0bd08766deeea5da9e3b3b)

question.content:
**Which clock matches the time shown on the number line?**

![The number line goes from 9:00 to 10:00. Every 15 minutes there are labels at 9:15, 9:30, and 9:45. Point A is labeled at 10 marks to the right of 9:00.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6f3409e1260aa2ae1dc229189909df5d39a37891)

[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A clock shows the short hour hand is between 1 and 2. The long minute hand points to 10.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1d8b8805470c8a080339220743b24b8c5726faba)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is almost pointing to 10. The long minute hand points to 10.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/79950c36842748974454535cde17c91788224e3f)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 9. The long minute hand points to 2.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ee9a259c88ca4263ba0bd08766deeea5da9e3b3b)
